summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from December 2018, containing a 2016 email from Stan Pottinger. In the 2016 email, Pottinger forwards contact information for Daniel Siad, whom he describes as a 'scour or recruiter of girls and/or women for J. Epstein.' The document includes an attachment with Siad's contact details.

persons.name: Stan Pottinger
persons.context: Forwards contact information for Daniel Siad, describing Siad's alleged role in recruiting for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Daniel Siad
persons.context: Described in the email as a 'scour or recruiter of girls and/or women for J. Epstein.' His contact information is attached.

persons.name: Amanda
persons.context: Recipient of the forwarded email from Stan Pottinger.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the individual for whom Daniel Siad allegedly recruited girls and women.

connections.description: Daniel Siad is described as a recruiter of girls and/or women for Jeffrey Epstein.
Stan Pottinger forwards Daniel Siad's contact information and describes his alleged role.

events.title: Pottinger forwards Siad contact info
events.description: Stan Pottinger sends an email forwarding contact information for Daniel Siad, whom he describes as a recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email chain forwarded
events.description: The 2016 email from Stan Pottinger is forwarded again as part of a correspondence chain.

keyFacts: Daniel Siad is explicitly described in an email as a 'scour or recruiter of girls and/or women for J. Epstein.'
The document contains an attachment with Daniel Siad's contact information, including phone numbers and an email address.
The email chain shows information about Epstein's alleged recruitment network being circulated in 2016 and again in 2018.
Stan Pottinger is the source forwarding the allegation and contact information about Daniel Siad.
